title: P2P Advert Information (response)
description: Returns information about the given advert ID.

account_currency.description: Currency for this advert. This is the system currency to be transferred between advertiser and client.

advertiser_details.title: Advertiser Details
advertiser_details.description: Details of the advertiser for this advert.

completion_rate.description: The percentage of successfully completed orders made by or placed against the advertiser within the past 30 days.

amount.description: The total amount specified in advert, in `account_currency`. It is only visible for advertisers.

amount_display.description: The total amount specified in advert, in `account_currency`, formatted to appropriate decimal places. It is only visible for advertisers.

contact_info.description: Advertiser contact information. Only applicable for 'sell adverts'.

counterparty_type.description: Type of transaction from the opposite party's perspective.

country.description: The target country code of the advert.

created_time.description: The advert creation time in epoch.

id.description: The unique identifier for this advert.

is_active.description: The activation status of the advert.

local_currency.description: Local currency for this advert. This is the form of payment to be arranged directly between advertiser and client.

max_order_amount.description: Maximum order amount specified in advert, in `account_currency`. It is only visible for advertisers.

max_order_amount_display.description: Maximum order amount specified in advert, in `account_currency`, formatted to appropriate decimal places. It is only visible for advertisers.

max_order_amount_limit.description: Maximum order amount at this time, in `account_currency`.

max_order_amount_limit_display.description: Maximum order amount at this time, in `account_currency`, formatted to appropriate decimal places.

min_order_amount.description: Minimum order amount specified in advert, in `account_currency`. It is only visible for advertisers.

min_order_amount_display.description: Minimum order amount specified in advert, in `account_currency`, formatted to appropriate decimal places. It is only visible for advertisers.

min_order_amount_limit.description: Minimum order amount at this time, in `account_currency`.

min_order_amount_limit_display.description: Minimum order amount at this time, in `account_currency`, formatted to appropriate decimal places.

payment_info.description: Payment instructions. Only applicable for 'sell adverts'.

price.description: Cost of the advert in local currency.

price_display.description: Cost of the advert in local currency, formatted to appropriate decimal places.

rate.description: Conversion rate from account currency to local currency.

rate_display.description: Conversion rate from account currency to local currency, formatted to appropriate decimal places.

remaining_amount.description: Amount currently available for orders, in `account_currency`. It is only visible for advertisers.

remaining_amount_display.description: Amount currently available for orders, in `account_currency`, formatted to appropriate decimal places. It is only visible for advertisers.

type.description: Whether this is a buy or a sell.

msg_type.description: Action name of the request made.

req_id.description: Optional field sent in request to map to response, present only when request contains `req_id`.
